sentence.Network_en: Henry and Wing - sze ( 1 st and 2 nd left ) spend time knowing other interns.

sentence.Network_en: He brought the mill buck and timbers from the countryside.
sentence.Network_cn: 他从乡下带来了锯木架和木材.
